Primitive.name: showCellIndex
Primitive.description:
Show the index number of each cell.
Use only with cells that are big enough. (Cell size > 15)

Primitive.name: showWallIndex
Primitive.description:
Show the index numbers of each wall.
Use only with walls that are big enough. (Cell size > 31)

Primitive.name: useRandomizerSeed
Primitive.description:
Use the specified seed to create the maze layout.
The seed will be ignored and the maze will be randomized if false.

Primitive.name: randomizerSeed
Primitive.description:
A random number to create a random maze layout.
The same number will always create the same maze.

Primitive.name: horizontalSize
Primitive.description:
The horizontal length of the maze measured in cells.
Has to be bigger than 1.

Primitive.name: verticalSize
Primitive.description:
The vertical length of the maze measured in cells.
Has to be bigger than 1

Primitive.name: cellSize
Primitive.description:
The size of one cell. Measured in pixels.
Has to be bigger than 1 and should be devidable by 2.

Primitive.name: disconnectedCellColor
Primitive.description: The color of a cell that is not connected yet.

Primitive.name: connectedCellColor
Primitive.description: The color of a cell that is connected.

Primitive.name: cellHighlightColor
Primitive.description: The highlight color of the cells.

Primitive.name: wallHighlightColor
Primitive.description: The highlight color of the walls.

Primitive.name: wallArrayHighlightColor
Primitive.description: The highlight color of the wall array.

Primitive.name: cellListProblemColor
Primitive.description: The highlight color of the cell list, if both highlighted cells are in the same list.

Primitive.name: cellListHighlightColor
Primitive.description: The highlight color of the cell lists.

Primitive.name: borderColor
Primitive.description: The color of the border and every indestructible part of the maze.
